name: Nice Quotes
description:
TAKE A MINUTE AND RELAX

Everyone has a tough day sometimes. Some days you don't want to talk. Some days you don't want people to talk to you. Some days you just need to hear some nice things. Well here is a little quote generator I made just for people like you. Take a minute and click around, read some nice stuff. When you're done you can head back to doing your best. 

CONTROLS:

Just click. That's it :)

MADE WITH:

p5.js

opengameart.org

Source Code: https://editor.p5js.org/Moises_Gabriel/sketches/k6gcHReQd

feel free to dig around the code, add new quotes, and do whatever you want!
